trans-unit.resname: SOI·1 | Always Watching | Card Name
trans-unit.source: Always Watching
trans-unit.target: 时刻戒护

trans-unit.resname: SOI·1 | Always Watching | Card Text | Paragraph 1
trans-unit.source: Nontoken creatures you control get +1/+1 and have vigilance.
trans-unit.target: 由你操控且非衍生物的生物得+1/+1且具有警戒异能。

trans-unit.resname: SOI·1 | Always Watching | Flavor Text
trans-unit.source: "We pray to Avacyn on high. On snow-white wings fearless you fly. Keep safe our souls. Keep safe our lives. May angels watch us from the skies."\n—Children's prayer
trans-unit.target: 「艾维欣在上，显灵佑安详。 凛空展雪翼，无畏任翱翔。 保全诸灵，佑护众生， 愿苍天诸使恩泽遍天下。」 ～儿童的祈祷文

trans-unit.source: Flying\nDelirium — Whenever CARDNAME deals damage, if there are four or more card types among cards in your graveyard, exile target creature an opponent controls.
trans-unit.target: 飞行 躁狂～每当CARDNAME造成伤害时，若你坟墓场中牌的类别有四种或更多，则放逐目标由对手操控的生物。

trans-unit.source: "We must save you from yourselves."
trans-unit.target: 「我们必将让你从自身罪恶中解脱。」

trans-unit.source:
Flash
Flying, vigilance
When CARDNAME enters the battlefield, creatures you control gain indestructible until end of turn.
When a non-Angel creature you control dies, transform CARDNAME at the beginning of the next upkeep.

trans-unit.resname: SOI·30 | Not Forgotten | Card Text | Paragraph 1
trans-unit.source: Put target card from a graveyard on the top or bottom of its owner's library. Put a 1/1 white Spirit creature token with flying onto the battlefield.

trans-unit.resname: SOI·30 | Not Forgotten | Flavor Text
trans-unit.source: Visit the dead, and they may return the favor.
trans-unit.target: 前去凭吊死者，或会得其回访为报。

trans-unit.resname: SOI·31 | Odric, Lunarch Marshal | Card Name
trans-unit.source: Odric, Lunarch Marshal
trans-unit.target: 月主会元帅欧吉克

trans-unit.resname: SOI·31 | Odric, Lunarch Marshal | Card Text | Paragraph 1
trans-unit.source: At the beginning of each combat, creatures you control gain first strike until end of turn if a creature you control has first strike. The same is true for flying, deathtouch, double strike, haste, hexproof, indestructible, lifelink, menace, reach, skulk, trample, and vigilance.
trans-unit.target: 在每次战斗开始时，如果由你操控的某个生物具有先攻异能，则由你操控的生物获得先攻异能直到回合结束。且飞行、死触、连击、敏捷、辟邪、不灭、系命、威慑、延势、潜匿、践踏与警戒异能亦比照办理。

trans-unit.resname: SOI·32 | Open the Armory | Card Name
trans-unit.source: Open the Armory
trans-unit.target: 打开兵械库

trans-unit.resname: SOI·32 | Open the Armory | Card Text | Paragraph 1
trans-unit.source: Search your library for an Aura or Equipment card, reveal it, and put it into your hand. Then shuffle your library.
trans-unit.target: 从你的牌库中搜寻一张灵气或武具牌，展示该牌，并将它置于你手上。然后将你的牌库洗牌。

trans-unit.resname: SOI·32 | Open the Armory | Flavor Text
trans-unit.source: "Once Avacyn returned, I hoped I'd never need these things again. I didn't think I'd be dusting them off to use against angels."
trans-unit.target: 「艾维欣重临后，我曾希望永远不会再用到这些武器。我从未想过我会要擦亮它们来对付天使。」

trans-unit.target: 躁狂～只要你坟墓场中牌的类别有四种或更多，CARDNAME便得+1/+0且具有先攻异能。

trans-unit.resname: SOI·33 | Paranoid Parish-Blade | Flavor Text
trans-unit.source: The mind is perfectly capable of creating its own monsters.
trans-unit.target: 精神本身完全有能力创造属于精神世界的怪物。

trans-unit.source: It is a grim duty to save the world from those created to protect it.

trans-unit.target: 勇迎未知

trans-unit.resname: SOI·198 | Confront the Unknown | Card Text | Paragraph 1
trans-unit.source: Investigate, then target creature gets +1/+1 until end of turn for each Clue you control. (To investigate, put a colorless Clue artifact token onto the battlefield with "{2}, Sacrifice this artifact: Draw a card.")
trans-unit.target: 探查，然后你每操控一个线索，目标生物便得+1/+1直到回合结束。（探查的流程是将一个无色线索衍生神器放进战场，且其具有「{2}，牺牲此神器：抓一张牌。」）

trans-unit.resname: SOI·198 | Confront the Unknown | Flavor Text
trans-unit.source: "Never flinch from the truth."\n—Thalia, Guardian of Thraben
trans-unit.target: 「真相面前不要退缩。」 ～瑟班守护者莎利雅

trans-unit.target: 蠕爬异感

trans-unit.source: At the beginning of your upkeep, you may put the top two cards of your library into your graveyard.\nWhenever one or more land cards are put into your graveyard from anywhere for the first time each turn, put a 1/1 green Insect creature token onto the battlefield.
trans-unit.target: 在你的维持开始时，你可以将你牌库顶的两张牌置入你的坟墓场。 每当每回合中第一次有一张或数张地牌从任何区域置入你的坟墓场时，将一个1/1绿色昆虫衍生生物放进战场。

trans-unit.source: In times of madness, people cling to the familiar, monstrous though it may be.

trans-unit.source: {2}{G}: Look at the top three cards of your library. You may reveal a creature card from among them and put it into your hand. Put the rest on the bottom of your library in any order.\nAt the beginning of each upkeep, if no spells were cast last turn, transform CARDNAME.

trans-unit.source: {T}: Add {C} to your mana pool.\n{5}, {T}, Pay 1 life: Put a 1/1 white and black Human Cleric creature token onto the battlefield.\n{5}, {T}, Sacrifice five creatures: Transform CARDNAME, then untap it.
trans-unit.target: {T}：加{C}到你的法术力池中。 {5}，{T}，支付1点生命：将一个1/1，白黑双色的人类／僧侣衍生生物放进战场。 {5}，{T}，牺牲五个生物：转化CARDNAME，然后将它重置。

trans-unit.resname: SOI·281 | Ormendahl, Profane Prince | Flavor Text
trans-unit.source: With Griselbrand gone, the Skirsdag eagerly awaited another demon to claim their devotion. Ormendahl did not make them wait long.
trans-unit.target: 棘泽边消亡后，史革达教急切希望效忠另一个恶魔。欧魔达没让他们久等。

trans-unit.source: CARDNAME enters the battlefield tapped.\n{T}: Add {G} or {U} to your mana pool.
trans-unit.target: CARDNAME须横置进战场。 {T}：加{G}或{U}到你的法术力池中。

trans-unit.resname: SOI·282 | Woodland Stream | Flavor Text
trans-unit.source: Two creaking waterwheels herald the approach to Briarbridge through the Ulvenwald.
trans-unit.target: 两架吱呀作响的水车引导支流通过沃文森，汇集到荆桥。
